item.description: Join the New England Network for Women for a great evening Cocktails and Conversations at Moksa!  The venue has great signature cocktails and a really nice, atmosphere that make it easy to relax and connect. It also has a terrific small appetizers that are fun and affordable. It's easy to get to right off of the T and there is also parking near by. We hope to see you there!

group.name: New England Network for Women :: Cambridge

item.name: New England Network for Women Cambridge Cocktails & Conversations Monthly Meetup
